original_title: How to outfox financial scammers | CNN Business
article_summary: "Financial scams, particularly imposter scams, are on the rise, with older adults being disproportionately affected. Scammers often contact victims pretending to be government agencies or businesses, demanding money or asking for account transfers. Be wary of unsolicited contacts, threats, and requests for cryptocurrency or bank transfers, as these are common red flags for scams."</s>
